name: Toontown: Scratched (Itch.io Edition)
description:
Are YOU Toon enough?

Toontown: Scratched is a Toontown Clone made using the Scratch Coding program. Playing a Toontown game with some of my own additions. In 2D, New Species, Spinoffs, and more! This is an open build. So not much is made. But the game is subject to change in the future.

I do not own the Disney logo or the Toontown franchise. All rights go to their owners. This was not funded or profited in any way. This is a fan project.

- - - PLEASE Keep in mind that this is a public build so this game doesn't feel like forever before the release! Expect some bugs and unfinished content. - - -
